ending_saint.text:
THE SAINT ENDING

Day 47. You saved 63 people. Trauma broke you, but humanity intact. They call you a hero. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

ending_survivor.text:
THE SURVIVOR ENDING

Day 47. Balanced approach. 15 people alive. Not hero, not villain. Just alive. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

ending_tyrant.text:
THE TYRANT ENDING

Day 47. You rule 94 through fear. Power is everything. They obey or die. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

ending_broken.text:
THE BROKEN ENDING

Day 47. Alive physically. Mentally shattered. The trauma won completely. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

ending_manipulator.text:
THE MANIPULATOR ENDING

Day 47. You control 47 through lies. You feel nothing. Perfect control. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

ending_lone_wolf.text:
THE LONE WOLF ENDING

Day 47. Completely alone. Trust no one. Need no one. Survive alone. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

path_to_saint.text: Day 45. You've helped everyone despite terrible cost. The group survives because of your compassion. Final test approaches. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

path_to_survivor.text: Day 45. You've balanced survival and morality. Small group, stable. Neither hero nor villain. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

path_to_tyrant.text: Day 45. Your iron rule has kept order. Fear keeps them in line. Power is absolute. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

path_to_broken.text: Day 45. You can't take it anymore. The trauma is overwhelming. You're breaking apart. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

path_to_manipulator.text: Day 45. Your web of lies is perfect. Everyone trusts you. No one knows the real you. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

path_to_lone_wolf.text: Day 45. You've isolated completely. Everyone else is gone. Alone by choice. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

crossroads_20.text: Day 20. Major decision: A rival group wants your supplies. They have hostages. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

negotiate_path.text: Day 22. Negotiations succeed. The hostages are freed. Both groups share resources. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

conflict_path.text: Day 22. The conflict is brutal. You win but at great cost. 3 of your people dead. Guilt weighs heavy. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: No time for grief - move on

alliance_path.text: Day 25. The alliance thrives. Combined group is stronger. You're becoming a leader. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

alex_inside.text:
Day 0, Hour 9. Alex collapses. Bite spreading fast. He gasps: 'Pills... pocket...'

You find 6 experimental pills. You give them all. The spreading STOPS. He's alive but still infected. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: Care for Alex and keep him comfortable
Question Alex about the outbreak details
Search your apartment for more supplies
Check on neighbors while Alex rests

alex_dies.text:
Day 0, Hour 9. You stayed silent. Alex screamed. Wet tearing sounds. Then moaning. He's one of them now.

Guilt crushes you. Or does it? The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

alex_info.text:
Day 0, Hour 9. Through the door Alex gasps: 'Fungal outbreak... hospital has treatment... 15-60 min infection...'

Then screaming. Then silence. Then moaning. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: You got intel but at what cost?
Information is survival - focus on that
Plan hospital run based on his info

window_check.text:
Day 0, Hour 9. You check the window. Streets: chaos, burning cars, hundreds of infected, spore growths pulsing.

Behind you: Alex's pounding stopped. Now just moaning. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

alex_care_day1.text: Day 1. Alex is stable. Pills working. He's grateful. You've formed a bond. He warns: pills will run out in weeks. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: Plan to find more pills together

check_neighbors_day1.text: Day 1. You knock on 3C. Mrs. Chen answers - terrified. 'My daughter... she's infected... locked in bathroom...' The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: Help Chen deal with her daughter
Invite Mrs. Chen to your place only

guilt_path_day1.text: Day 1. The guilt is crushing. You can't stop seeing Alex's face. Sleep won't come. Food tastes like ash. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: Bury it deep and numb out

cold_path_day1.text: Day 1. You feel nothing. Alex's death means nothing. Survival is all. You check supplies: 3 days food, 5 days water. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: Look for other survivors to use

Your group watches your decision. Every choice shapes who you're becoming. The Bloom spreads. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

start.text:
Day 0, Hour 8

Frantic pounding on your door.

'PLEASE! OH GOD PLEASE OPEN UP!'

Alex from 4B. Through peephole: torn scrubs, blood-soaked, bite marks, dark veins spreading.

Behind him: shuffling, moaning.

What do you do?

The apocalypse began 3 days ago. Meridian Research facility lost containment of experimental fungal pathogen. Airborne spores. 100% infection rate. 15-60 minute conversion time. You are in Zone Alpha - the red zone. No evacuation. No rescue. Just survival. Your hands shake. The weight grows.

choices.text: Open door and pull him inside
